query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:APPLICATION:b.sort:sort@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:APPLICATION:b.label:label@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:APPLICATION:b.app_count:app_count@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:APPLICATION:b.code:code@ FROM ( SELECT count(DISTINCT inv.id) app_count, 'Good Fit' label, 1 sort, 'Q1' code FROM INV_INVESTMENTS inv INNER JOIN ODF_APPLICATION_V2 a on inv.id = a.odf_pk WHERE a.apm_business_score >= 50 AND a.apm_technology_score >= 50 AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:install_type@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:install_type@ = a.apm_install_type) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:vendor@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:vendor@ = a.apm_vendor) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:category_filter@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:category_filter@ = a.category_code) UNION SELECT count(DISTINCT inv.id), 'Poor Technology Score' label, 2 sort, 'Q4' code FROM INV_INVESTMENTS inv INNER JOIN ODF_APPLICATION_V2 a on inv.id = a.odf_pk WHERE a.apm_business_score >= 50 AND a.apm_technology_score < 50 AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:install_type@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:install_type@ = a.apm_install_type) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:vendor@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:vendor@ = a.apm_vendor) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:category_filter@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:category_filter@ = a.category_code) UNION SELECT count(DISTINCT inv.id), 'Poor Business Value' label, 3 sort, 'Q2' code FROM INV_INVESTMENTS inv INNER JOIN ODF_APPLICATION_V2 a on inv.id = a.odf_pk WHERE a.apm_business_score < 50 AND a.apm_technology_score >= 50 AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:install_type@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:install_type@ = a.apm_install_type) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:vendor@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:vendor@ = a.apm_vendor) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:category_filter@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:category_filter@ = a.category_code) UNION SELECT count(DISTINCT inv.id), 'Poor Fit' label, 4 sort, 'Q3' code FROM INV_INVESTMENTS inv INNER JOIN ODF_APPLICATION_V2 a on inv.id = a.odf_pk WHERE a.apm_business_score < 50 AND a.apm_technology_score < 50 AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:install_type@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:install_type@ = a.apm_install_type) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:vendor@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:vendor@ = a.apm_vendor) AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:category_filter@ IS NULL OR @WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:STRING:category_filter@ = a.category_code) ) b WHERE @FILTER@
